Package it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.network.server

Class MainServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.ps51.network.server.MainServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MainServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This class represents the central server which handles: the creation of the room, the setting of the controller game, the setting of the model, and it handles the ClientInterface In fact, here there are all the nicknames of all the players, the nickname which are searching for a room, and all the references between the nicknames and the connections used by the clients
Author:
Luca Giacometti

    • setNumberOfPlayer

      public void setNumberOfPlayer​(java.lang.Integer number)
      Setter of number of player
      Parameters:
      number - the number of the player for the game which is processing

    • computeTheSizeOfList

      public boolean computeTheSizeOfList()
      This method obtains a synchronize access to the list of nicknames which are waiting to start a game, and to the number of player to be processed before to start the game. If there are no players it sets the numberOfPlayer to 0. If the number is different from 0, it checks if there are enough players to start the game.
      Returns:
      true if the number of nicknames are under the right number or the number is 0 false if there are enough nicknames

    • addNickname

      public void addNickname​(java.lang.String s, ServerInterface serverInterface)
      This method adds the nickname choose by a client into the lists of nicknames and create the link between the nickname and his connection
      Parameters:
      s - the nickname of the client
      serverInterface - the connection which the client is using

    • checkName

      public boolean checkName​(java.lang.String nickToCheck)
      This method check if the nickname choose by the user is already used or not inside the list of all nickname present
      Parameters:
      nickToCheck - the nickname to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the nickname is not already present false if it is already present

    • iMFirst

      public boolean iMFirst​(java.lang.String nickname)
      This method checks in the list of nickname which are in search of a game if the nickname passed as parameter is the first one or not
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the user
      Returns:
      true if it is the first of the list false if it is not

    • setSS

      public void setSS​(ServerSocket ss)
      Setter of ServerSocket
      Parameters:
      ss - the ServerSocket

    • removeNickname

      public void removeNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      This method removes the nickname from all the lists which contain it
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname to remove from the server

    • checkIfThereIsAlreadyARoom

      public boolean checkIfThereIsAlreadyARoom()
      This method checks if the listOfRoom is empty or not
      Returns:
      true if the list is not empty false otherwise

    • reAskNumberIfIWasTheFirstOneAndOtherAreConnected

      public void reAskNumberIfIWasTheFirstOneAndOtherAreConnected​(java.lang.String nickname)
      If the client which is disconnected is the first one and there are others waiting this method sets the number of player to 0 and asks to the next client the number of player for this game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the client disconnected

    • run

      public void run()
      Here is launched the ServerSocket as thread. When this thread is running, it waits the right number of players. After it controls if there are out of room players and when the number of players is right: it stops the ServerSocket, sets a new Room, clear the actual nickname in search of room list, and terminates
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
